Constantly attending to, devoted. From eu and the same as prosedreuo; sitting well towards, i.e. assiduous.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

36.str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

36.parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
36.str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

36.parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
36.str2: From nomos; properly, to do by law, i.e. To accustom; by extension, to deem or regard.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

36.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular

36.parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

36.str2: Perhaps from a and the base of meros; properly, to miss the mark, i.e. to err, especially to sin.

36.parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Plural
36.str2: To marry, used of either sex. From gamos; to wed.

37.str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

37.str2: Who, which, what, that.

An act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires. From the prolonged form of ethelo; a determination, i.e. choice or inclination.
And, even, also, namely.

37.parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
